title: UFO message ‘from humanity’s future’ waited thirty years to be read
description: USAF Sergeant James W Penniston claimed a cryptic code was telepathically downloaded into his mind after touching an unidentified craft in Rendlesham Forest, Suffolk, in December 1980

title: UFO message ‘from humanity’s future’ waited thirty years to be read
description: The United States Air Force security were baffled by a strangely behaving collection of lights in a Suffolk forest - now one man reveals the secret code he claims he was given by the alien life forms

title: Message from UFO left in UK forest finally released after 40 years by Ministry of Defence
description: Sergeant James W Penniston says a code was downloaded into his mind after touching a UFO in Suffolk 40 years ago - and it allegedly contains coordinates to ancient sites with a cryptic message

title: LEGO Just Released a 3-in-1 Space Telescope That Also Turns Into a Microscope and a UFO

title: Secret documents reveal military chiefs ordered urgent UFO probe after mysterious sighting
description: MILITARY intelligence officials ordered staff to probe into UFO tech amid fears alien craft could outmanoeuvre planes. Secret documents revealed in the National Archives show the mysterious sightings being treated with critical importance in the 1990s. One internal Ministry of Defence memo from 1997 calls them unidentified aerial phenomena (UAPs). It says: “If significant numbers...
